price: 你只是像我们一样的凡人。你应当昭示一个迹象，如果你是诚实的。”
arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mith'lunā fati biāyatin in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
